author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA OFF THE COAST OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE U.S. SOUTHWEST DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary: ...PRISCILLA OFF THE COAST OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE U.S. SOUTHWEST DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS... As of 2:00 AM MST Thu Oct 09 the center of Priscilla was located near 23.3, -114.1 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA OFF THE COAST OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING ACROSS THE U.S. SOUTHWEST DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS... As of 2:00 AM MST Thu Oct 09 the center of Priscilla was located near 23.3, -114.1 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 994 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
